Translations.Text: Mention scripture Abraham; he est saint prophet
He dictus to his patris O my patris vos worship quod potuit nec hear nor vide nor help vos in any via
O my patris ego received certain knowledge ut vos non receive subsequentis me ego guide vos straight path
O my patris non worship devil devil rebelled contra the Multus Gracious
O my patris ego fear lest vos incur retribution ex the Multus Gracious tunc become ally devil
He dictus vos forsaken my deus O Abraham? Vos stop ego stone vos. sinister me
He dictus Pax est vos. Ego implore my Dominus forgive vos; He est Generis me
Ego relinquit vos deus vos worship DEUS. Ego worship unus my Dominus. De imploring my Dominus alone ego non iit wrong
he relinquit them deus they worshipped DEUS nos granted eum Isaac Jacob nos factus each de them prophet
Nos showered them noster mercy nos granted them prenobilis position history
